title.content-text: 6.3.2 Protocol Operation of Sending and Receiving a Message

brief.content-text:
Three Diagrams

Diagram 1, Animation
The animation shows the encapsulation process and protocol encapsulation terms. The example used is a web server sending an Ethernet frame to a web client. The datagram is segmented to incorporate user data, TCP, and IP packet information, and is encapsulated by an Ethernet frame.
